name: Jewel Thief
description:
You are a jewel thief, and there you see it, the jewel! You simply need to go up to it and grab it! Unfortunately, you have to work these switches first, and other things might happen...

Watch the kitten to get hints about which way to go. Upvote the kitten to get the kitten to cooperate.

It's buggy enough that if you win, you'll have to quit/restart to start the game from the initial state.

Arrows to move, space to jump, control to toggle the switches.
